title: Florida legislature passes bill prohibiting some classroom instruction about sexual orientation and gender identity - CNN
content:
1. Florida legislature passes bill prohibiting some classroom instruction about sexual orientation and gender identity  CNN
  2. Florida students participate in massive walkout to protest the 'Don't Say Gay' bill  CNN
  3. LGBTQ community rallies and reacts as 'Don't Say Gay' bill clears Florida Legislature  South Florida Sun Sentinel
  4. Opinion | Florida's 'Don't Say Gay' bill hurts kids  The Washington Post
  5. Florida’s ‘Don’t Say Gay’ bill is just as bizarre as we thought, according to the person who sponsored it  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Lawmakers in Florida gave final approval Tuesday to a bill that would ban certain instruction about sexual orientation and gender identity in the classroom, sending the controversial bill to the desk of Republican Gov. Ron DeSantis, who has signaled his support for the measure.
